hero.headline: Hello I am,
hero.name: Fernando Yonamine
hero.subline:
I am a developer in career transition to the Information Technology area, driven by curiosity and the desire to solve real problems through technology. 
I have always been interested in the tech world, but it was with digital evolution and the growing demand for online solutions that I decided to transform this interest into a profession.

about.title: About me
description: Holding a Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration and currently living in Japan, I have built a professional path across diverse sectors. This background has provided me with a solid foundation in problem-solving, teamwork, and process optimization.

I’ve always been fascinated by technology and how digital solutions are crafted. This interest led me to pivot into the IT field, where I am now dedicated to studying and practicing full-stack web development, working with technologies such as React, TypeScript, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.

I believe that good code is clear, simple, and well-structured. Before writing the first line, I strive to understand the context and the goals of the solution, valuing both technical quality and the experience of those who will use and maintain the system. I see learning as a continuous process and view my transition to IT as a natural evolution of my professional journey, seeking to build solutions that make a practical impact.
